message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI 

This paper is likely to belong to the category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) as it deals with continuous speech recognition (CSR) system, which is a subfield of natural language processing (NLP). It may also belong to the sub-category of Software Engineering (cs.SD) as it discusses the development of a system. Information Retrieval (cs.IR) is another possible sub-category as the paper deals with selecting the target vocabulary for a particular domain. Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) are also possible sub-categories as the paper presents three principled approaches to select the target vocabulary, which involves the use of machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques.
